name: Guardian of Orr
description:
Defend the Orr from hordes of enemies.

Plan ahead, you have an entire day to get stronger before another assault begins.

Build buildings to aid you in battle, decorate your area, or buff you. Press Q to build.

The Orr is a powerful structure, and everyone wants its power. Sadly, your buddies are out of town, and an attack has been set in motion to destroy the Orr. Defend it from monsters, nightmares and glitches, to get a better score, and compete with others for the top score!

IF THE BACKGROUND OF THE ITCH PAGE IS CUTTING OFF AT THE EDGES, ZOOM IN THE PAGE A LITTLE BIT!!

Enemies

Normal - Chase you around, and try to destroy the Orr.

Nightmare - Can only be seen under light. Moonlight won't do.

Glitch - Teleport once hit.

Known issues

  • Going back to the main menu after dying sometimes doesn't work. Usually happens after getting a new high score.

Team

Lennyi - Programming, Art

Evan Gadert - Music (Youtube)
